data.name: ProviderNumberOfEmployees
data.value: Number Of Employees

data.name: ProviderNumberOfEmployeesAnalytical
data.value:
The number of the employees of the Host company in full time estimation on annual basis.

In the case of seasonal full-time employees, the equivalent in annual base is calculated
e.g. 4 employees with six months full-time job = 2 employees

In the case of part-time, the equivalent of full-time in annual base is calculated
e.g. 4 employees with six months part-time (50%) = 1 employee

[digits only, without dots, e.g. 60]

data.name: ProviderNumberOfEmployeesInvalid
data.value: Field 'Number Of Employees' must only be numeric characters

data.name: ProviderNumberOfEmployeesTooltip
data.value:
The number of the employees of the Host company on annual basis
[digits only, without dots, eg 60]

data.name: ProviderNumberOfEmployeesValidation
data.value: Field 'Number Of Employees' is required

data.name: ProviderNumberOfEmployeesZero
data.value: Field 'Number Of Employees' must be greater than 0
